get.description: List customers with optional pagination and search filtering.
Retrieve a single customer by ID or alias.

delete.description: No linked entity will be deleted. You need to terminate all active subscriptions before archiving a customer, or the call will fail.

post.summary: Generate a portal token for a customer
post.description:
Generates a JWT token that grants access to the customer portal.
The token can be used to access invoices, payment methods, and other portal features.
Ingest usage events for metering and billing purposes.

get.description: List invoices with optional filtering by customer, subscription, or status.

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: Filter by customer ID or alias

get.description: Retrieve a single invoice with its payment transactions.
Download the PDF document for an invoice.

schema.description: Unused dummy struct only used for an OpenAPI definition.

404.description: Invoice not found or PDF not available

get.description: List plans with optional filtering by product family.
Retrieve the details of a specific plan
Retrieve a single product family by ID or alias.
List subscriptions with optional filtering by customer or plan.

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: Filter by customer ID or alias

post.description: Create a new subscription for a customer with a specific plan.

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a subscription including price components and schedules.

post.description: Cancel a subscription either immediately or at the end of the billing period.

billing_periods.description: Map of component_id -> available billing periods (e.g., "MONTHLY", "ANNUAL")

capacity_thresholds.description: Map of component_id -> available capacity values

slot_components.description: List of component_ids that support slot parametrization (initial slot count)

effective_date.description: If not provided, the cancellation will be effective at the end of the current billing or committed period.

CapacityPlanFee.description: Capacity-based fee with included committed usage and overage

portal_url.description: Base URL of the customer portal

customer_id.description: Either Meteroid's customer_id or an alias

allow_backfilling.description: allow ingesting events with timestamps more than a day in the past

activated_at.description: When the subscription was activated (first payment or activation condition met)

auto_advance_invoices.description: If false, invoices will stay in Draft until manually reviewed and finalized. Default to true.

billing_start_date.description: When billing started (after any trial period)

charge_automatically.description: Automatically try to charge the customer's configured payment method on finalize.

net_terms.description: Payment terms in days (0 = due on issue)

start_date.description: When the subscription contract starts (benefits apply from this date)

activated_at.description: When the subscription was activated (first payment or activation condition met)
